headline: Pfizer Is Trading As If It's 2009 Again
summary: Pfizer's stock is poised for growth due to its strong pipeline, smart cost management, and recovery from COVID-19 revenue decline. Read more about PFE stock here.

headline: 5 Large Drug Stocks to Watch as Industry Recovers
summary: R&D innovation is likely to remain a major focus area in 2025. In the Large-Cap Pharmaceuticals industry, AbbVie (ABBV), Novo Nordisk (NVO), Novartis (NVS), Pfizer (PFE) and Bayer (BAYRY) are worth retaining in one's portfolio
